languages.text: Скованный разум не постигнет заключенной здесь мудрости, потому повторяй — Он — есть Смерть. С каждым словом отпускай дыхание. Очисти мысли. Он — есть Смерть. Истина в Смерти. Освободи душу из клетки тела. Стань ничем. Он — есть Смерть. Теперь, когда твой пульс уподобился линии, а зрение окутано полумраком, состояние чистоты и равновесия почти достигнуто. Внемли.

A shackled mind cannot comprehend the wisdom contained herein; therefore repeat: He is Death. Release your breath with each word. Cleanse your thoughts. He is Death. Truth lies in Death. Free your soul from the body's cage. Become nothing. He is Death. Now that your heartbeat is a perfect line and your vision is shrouded in dusk, you have almost reached a state of purity and balance. Heed.
languages.original_text: Скованный разум не постигнет заключенной здесь мудрости, потому повторяй — Он — есть Смерть. С каждым словом отпускай дыхание. Очисти мысли. Он — есть Смерть. Внемли.

traits.locale_text: A shackled mind cannot comprehend the wisdom contained herein; therefore repeat: Ayen Kaen Dho. Release your breath with each word. Cleanse your thoughts. Ayen Kaen Dho. Truth lies in Death. Free your soul from the body's cage. Become nothing. Ayen Kaen Dho. Now that your heartbeat is a flat line and your vision is shrouded in dusk, you have almost reached a state of purity and balance. Heed.

languages.text: Ein gefesselter Verstand kann die hierin enthaltene Weisheit nicht begreifen; wiederholt daher: Er ist der Tod. Atmet mit jedem Wort aus. Reinigt Eure Gedanken. Er ist der Tod. Die Wahrheit liegt im Tod. Befreit Eure Seele vom Käfig des Körpers. Werdet zu nichts. Er ist der Tod. Nun, da Euer Herzschlag eine perfekte Linie ist und Eure Sicht von der Dämmerung umhüllt, habt Ihr schon beinahe einen Zustand der Reinheit und des Gleichgewichts erreicht. Höret.
languages.original_text: A shackled mind cannot comprehend the wisdom contained herein; therefore repeat: He is Death. Release your breath with each word. Cleanse your thoughts. He is Death. Truth lies in Death. Free your soul from the body's cage. Become nothing. He is Death. Now that your heartbeat is a perfect line and your vision is shrouded in dusk, you have almost reached a state of purity and balance. Heed.

languages.text: Una mente encadenada no puede comprender la sabiduría albergada aquí. Por lo tanto, repite: Él es la muerte. Suelta aire con cada palabra. Purifica tus pensamientos. Él es la muerte. La verdad está en la muerte. Libera tu alma de la prisión del cuerpo. Conviértete en nada. Él es la muerte. Ahora que tu corazón se ha detenido y tu visión está oscurecida, casi has alcanzado la pureza y el equilibrio. Escuchad.
languages.original_text: A shackled mind cannot comprehend the wisdom contained herein; therefore repeat: He is Death. Release your breath with each word. Cleanse your thoughts. He is Death. Truth lies in Death. Free your soul from the body's cage. Become nothing. He is Death. Now that your heartbeat is a perfect line and your vision is shrouded in dusk, you have almost reached a state of purity and balance. Heed.

traits.locale_text: Una mente encadenada no puede comprender la sabiduría albergada aquí. Por lo tanto, repite: Él es la muerte. Suelta aire con cada palabra. Purifica tus pensamientos. Ahora que tu corazón se ha detenido y tu visión está oscurecida, casi has alcanzado la pureza y el equilibrio. Escuchad.

languages.text: 精神が縛られていては、ここに含まれる叡智を理解することはできない。故に繰り返せ、彼は死だ。言葉とともに息を吐き出せ。思考を浄化せよ。彼は死だ。真実は死の中にある。魂を体の檻から解き放て。無になるのだ。彼は死だ。これであなたの鼓動は完璧なラインとなり、司会は夕暮れに包まれた今、あなたは清らかでバランスの取れた状態にほぼ到達している。注意せよ。
languages.original_text: A shackled mind cannot comprehend the wisdom contained herein; therefore repeat: He is Death. Release your breath with each word. Cleanse your thoughts. He is Death. Truth lies in Death. Free your soul from the body's cage. Become nothing. He is Death. Now that your heartbeat is a perfect line and your vision is shrouded in dusk, you have almost reached a state of purity and balance. Heed.

traits.locale_text: 精神が縛られていては、ここに含まれる叡智を理解することはできない。故に繰り返せ、彼は死だ。言葉とともに息を吐き出せ。思考を浄化せよ。彼は死だ。真実は死の中にある。魂を体の檻から解き放て。無になるのだ。彼は死だ。これであなたの鼓動は完璧なラインとなり、司会は夕暮れに包まれた今、あなたは清らかでバランスの取れた状態にほぼ到達している。注意せよ。

languages.text: 受到束缚的心灵无法理解神圣经文中的智慧。重复以下话语：祂便是死亡本身。每说出一个字，就释放一次你的呼吸，净化你的思想。祂便是死亡本身。真理藏匿于死亡之中，将你的灵魂从肉体的牢笼中解放出来吧，化为虚无。祂便是死亡本身。如今，你的心跳已至臻完美，你的目光笼罩在黄昏之中。你已经几乎进入了纯净与平衡的状态，继续保持下去。
languages.original_text: A shackled mind cannot comprehend the wisdom contained herein; therefore repeat: He is Death. Release your breath with each word. Cleanse your thoughts. He is Death. Truth lies in Death. Free your soul from the body's cage. Become nothing. He is Death. Now that your heartbeat is a perfect line and your vision is shrouded in dusk, you have almost reached a state of purity and balance. Heed.

traits.locale_text: 受到束缚的心灵无法理解神圣经文中的智慧。重复以下话语：祂便是死亡本身。每说出一个字，就释放一次你的呼吸，净化你的思想。祂便是死亡本身。真理藏匿于死亡之中，将你的灵魂从肉体的牢笼中解放出来吧，化为虚无。祂便是死亡本身。如今，你的心跳已至臻完美，你的目光笼罩在黄昏之中。你已经几乎进入了纯净与平衡的状态，继续保持下去。

languages.text: Un esprit enchaîné ne peut comprendre la sagesse contenue dans ces lignes, il lui faut donc répéter : il incarne la mort. Relâchez votre souffle à chaque mot. Purifiez vos pensées. Il incarne la mort. La vérité réside dans la mort. Libérez votre âme de sa prison corporelle. Devenez rien. Il incarne la mort. Lorsque les battements de votre cœur forment une ligne et que votre vision s'assombrit, alors seulement vous approchez-vous d'un état parfait d'équilibre et de pureté. Écoutez.
languages.original_text: A shackled mind cannot comprehend the wisdom contained herein; therefore repeat: He is Death. Release your breath with each word. Cleanse your thoughts. He is Death. Truth lies in Death. Free your soul from the body's cage. Become nothing. He is Death. Now that your heartbeat is a perfect line and your vision is shrouded in dusk, you have almost reached a state of purity and balance. Heed.

languages.text: Prangaya vurulmuş bir zihin, içinde saklı bilgeliği idrak edemez. O yüzden tekrar edin: O Ölüm'dür. Her bir kelimeyle birlikte nefes verin. Düşüncelerinizi arındırın. O Ölüm'dür. Ölüm'de hakikat yatar. Ruhlarınızı bedenin kafesinden azat edin. Hiçbir şeye dönüşün. O Ölüm'dür. Kalpleriniz mükemmel bir istikrarla attığına ve görüşleriniz alaca karanlıkla örtüldüğüne göre saflık ve denge vaziyetine erişmek üzeresiniz. Kulak verin.
languages.original_text: A shackled mind cannot comprehend the wisdom contained herein; therefore repeat: He is Death. Release your breath with each word. Cleanse your thoughts. He is Death. Truth lies in Death. Free your soul from the body's cage. Become nothing. He is Death.
